text:
[Verse]
Walking in the dark now
Neon lights they glow
Whispers in the alley
Where do we all go

[Verse 2]
City's like a heartbeat
Pounding in my chest
Lost among the faces
Searching for some rest

[Chorus]
Midnight streets are calling
Echoes of our dreams
In the night we're falling
Nothing as it seems

[Verse 3]
Hear the distant sirens
Wailing through the night
Shadows dance like phantoms
In the pale moonlight

[Bridge]
Wandering together
Lost but feeling free
Hand in hand forever
In this urban sea

[Chorus]
Midnight streets are calling
Echoes of our dreams
In the night we're falling
Nothing as it seems
title: Midnight Streets
